newsitem.title: THAILAND: Siam Cement Q2 net rises.
newsitem.headline: Siam Cement Q2 net rises.

text.p: Results for six months ended June 30, 1996

Company also reported consolidated profit for second quarter of 1.70 billion baht or 14.14 baht a share vs 1.68 billion baht or 13.99 per share for the same period last year. Consolidated net for the first six months totalled 4.34 billion baht or 36.13 per share vs 3.87 billion baht or 32.28 baht a share.
